relation.text: 25 Feb : -- 87 My dear Friend I hope
heard . I have been in Town only a week
is comfortably set down in his pleasant little retreat at Kew ; he is in good health this Winter
looked vastly well , and was dreſs 'd with g reat modesty and elegance . She has done marvels this winter
friday ; Buckthorn is gallant and sends
will only increase my regret at not being there . Yours my dear friend most faithfully Ly . Cremorne London february twenty sixth 1787
